summary: This document is an email chain from August 2019 forwarding a communication about a potential connection between the Jeffrey Epstein case and an individual named Blixseth. It involves FBI and DOJ personnel discussing receiving an initial letter from Blixseth in 2016 and considering its relevance.

persons.name: Blixseth
persons.role: Individual who sent initial letter to FBI
persons.context: Mentioned as the sender of an initial letter received by the FBI in 2016, which is being discussed in relation to the Jeffrey Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffery Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case being discussed; the email inquiry is about involvement in his case and potential relevance of information from Blixseth.

connections.description: Blixseth sent information to the FBI that may be relevant to the Epstein case, suggesting a potential connection being investigated.

events.title: Initial letter from Blixseth to FBI
events.description: An initial letter was received by the FBI from an individual named Blixseth.

events.title: Email forwarding Blixseth information
events.description: Email correspondence discussing the Blixseth letter and its potential relevance to the Jeffrey Epstein case.

locations: 1400 New York Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20005
keyFacts: An individual named Blixseth sent an initial letter to the FBI in 2016.
In August 2019, DOJ and FBI personnel were discussing whether Blixseth's information was relevant to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The email chain indicates ongoing investigative interest in potential connections to the Epstein case beyond the main allegations.
